}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The casing used by this device may indicate it is a '''Gemtek''' product (WUBR-194GN?).
{{WiFiCert|WFA6066|05/09/2008}} :indicates this is a 2-stream device, it's presumed to use 2870+2820
